document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: proposed schedule. 
Date: Tue, 24 Sep 2019 13:26:57 +0000 
I think so, but we are going to chat today or tomorrow and we will know more after that. 
It will get done. No reason not 
to. 
Bruce Barket 
Barket, Epstein, Kearon, Aldea & 
LoTurco 
666 Old Country road 
Garden City, NY 11530 
Barket Epstein.com 
On Sep 
24, 2019, at 9:09 AM, wrote: 
Can you commit to getting us a proposed schedule by October 4 (the end of next week), and we can meet later the 
following week? 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Subject: Re: proposed schedule. 
Good 
morning, 
We are still working internally on a proposed schedule. Can we circle back to you on a week or two? We 
should still have plenty of time to meet and hopefully agree on dates before our next status conference. 
Bruce Barket 
Barket, Epstein, Kearon, Aldea & LoTurco 
666 Old Country road 
Garden 
City, NY 11530 
EFTA00019695

Barket Epstein.com 
On Sep 21, 
2019, at 9:33 AM, wrote: 
We are free Thursday afternoon except from 2:45 - 4. 
Assistant U.S. Attorney
On Sep 21, 2019, at 07:22, wrote: 
Any day next week works for me. Also in my role as Learned Counsel, and in full compliance with the ABA 
Guidelines, I will be submitting a proposed schedule for penalty phase pleadings over the weekend. 
Thanks 
Tonyricco 
----Original Message---
Sent Fri, Sep 20, 2019 9:15 pm 
Subject: Re: proposed schedule. 
We are free next Friday afternoon if that works for you all.
Attorney 
On Sep 20, 2019, at 12:16, Bruce Barke Nrote: 
I think we will be ready to propose a schedule sometime early next week. Is there a day and time when you can meet 
to discuss? We will send you a proposed briefing schedule ahead of the meeting. I hope to have ours finalized no 
later than Tuesday. 
Bruce A. Barket, Esq. 
Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP 
666 Old Country Road , Ste. 700 
www.bar etepstein.com 
This transmittal may be a confidential attorney client communication or may otherwise be privileged or confidential. If 
it is not dear that you are the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that you have received this transmittal in 
error; any review, dissemination, distribution or copying of this transmittal is strictly prohibited. If you suspect that you 
have received this communication in error, please notify us immediately by telephone or email and immediately delete 
this message and all its attachments 
EFTA00019696
